Binary: lxc, lxc-dev, lxc-tests, liblxc1t64, liblxc-common, libpam-cgfs
Build-Depends: bash-completion, debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-apparmor, docbook2x, doxygen, graphviz, libapparmor-dev, libcap-dev, libdbus-1-dev, libgnutls28-dev, libpam0g-dev, libseccomp-dev [!alpha !ia64 !m68k !sh4 !sparc64], libselinux-dev, linux-libc-dev, meson (>= 0.61), pkgconf, systemd-dev
Package-List: liblxc-common deb libs optional arch=linux-any liblxc1t64 deb libs optional arch=linux-any libpam-cgfs deb admin optional arch=linux-any lxc deb admin optional arch=linux-any lxc-dev deb libdevel optional arch=linux-any lxc-tests deb admin optional arch=linux-any
Testsuite-Triggers: busybox-static, debootstrap, dirmngr, dnsmasq-base, file, gnupg, iptables, rsync, uidmap, xz-utils
